row.entry: This module implements a generic color look up table in Lab space. The input is a list of source and target points, the complete mapping will be interpolated using splines. The resulting luts are editable by hand and can be created using the darktable-chartutility to match given input (such as hald-cluts and RAW/JPEG with in-camera processing pairs). See Using darktable-chart Using darktable-chartfor details.
